mapper.select:
select id as id, hotelId as hotelId, roomId as roomId, recordDate as recordDate, store as store, creationDate as creationDate, createdBy as createdBy, modifyDate as modifyDate, modifiedBy as modifiedBy from itrip_hotel_temp_store
and id=#{ id}
mapper.insert: save into itrip_hotel_temp_store( hotelId as hotelId, roomId as roomId, recordDate as recordDate, store as store, creationDate as creationDate, createdBy as createdBy, modifyDate as modifyDate, modifiedBy as modifiedBy ) values( #{column hotelId}, #{column roomId}, #{column recordDate}, #{column store}, #{column creationDate}, #{column createdBy}, #{column modifyDate}, #{column modifiedBy} )
mapper.delete: remove from itrip_hotel_temp_store where id = ${ id}
